## ProgramBuilder.addressOf() method

Create an 'AddressOf' expression for WGSL

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ref | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | The reference variable |
